start
Class CommandLineStarter

java.lang.Object
  start.CommandLineStarter

public class CommandLineStarter
extends java.lang.Object

This class offers a simple command line interface for running Cluedo. This is the alternative to the graphical user interface, which could be started using GUIStarter.

See Also:
GUIStarter, CommandLineUIController

Constructor Detail

CommandLineStarter

public CommandLineStarter()
Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
This is the main runner method when using command line interface. After basic sanity checks, it starts a game with the specified number of different kinds of players. Then a basic menu command line is lunched to control the game flow via keyboard.

Parameters:
args - ([#ai [#stupid]]) specifies the number of stupid and AI players
